message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll really appreciate its features and benefits. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the market value of the product.

I'm willing to be flexible, Bob, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm going to try to meet you at $10500, but I'll add a small premium for the value I bring to the table. I'm counteroffering at $11200. This is my final offer on the product.
